ygData.subject: Re: Ykesha? Just say Yes-sha
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s what I heard also.  This obviously means that Verant is going to add a really nice Bard-only weapon with similar stats.  They certainly wouldn t
ygData.messageBody:
Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> what i heard was that soon the ghoul lord will drop a sword that is warrior
> only with similar stats. just a rumour as of now, i haven't heard this
> happening on any live servers yet.
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
> Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
> Mithaniel Marr Server
>

That's what I heard also. This obviously means that Verant is going to add a
really nice Bard-only weapon with similar stats. They certainly wouldn't drop
the Ykesha spawn, replace it only with a warrior-only weapon, and thereby
deprive us of one of the best weapons in the normal game without compensating
us. (drips with sarcasm)

Kenross Cantoforjado, 33 songs, Innoruuk

PS I would say that it doesn't matter to me, since my level 50 warrior friend
has two Ykeshas which he will surely want to replace, and I can probably wheedle
them away from him. Verant surely wouldn't nerf the existing Ykeshas by making
them no-drop. (drips with sarcasm, again)

PPS Ah, who cares? I'm switching to instruments now, anyway. :)
